name: Bull Rider: Bull Riding Race
description:
Are you tired of playing racing games that confine you to a single track you are not supposed to leave and the Same Old Cars,Bikes and "Monster Trucks"?
Do you want to break free from Lifeless racing games?
In a world where mankind is burning its final resources a few fearless warriors race on this Two Ton of FURIOUS BULLs to save the last drops of oil.
publishers: Al Khawarizmi Software Development and Services
